name: Bandage
description: Patch yourself up and restore some of your health!

name: Enhanced Resistances
description: Have an increased chance to avoid being inflicted by status abnormalities.

name: Stealth
description: Significantly increases chances to avoid and sneak past hostile entities.

name: Tracking
description: More likely to find food sources.

name: Study Time!
description: Significantly increases the quality of rewards you receive from your activity.

name: Enhanced Cognition
description: You receive additional insight about the environment/area you are in.
